All synced, nothing to do here!
Everything is ready, go ahead and sync with the courier!

You can still send and receive data from the Internet via Relaynet couriers: 

Simply connect to a courier’s device and we’ll synchronize the data for you. 

It’s impossible for anyone to see or change your data in transit, nor can anyone see which apps you’re using. 

Also, any data lost in transit will be re-delivered as soon as possible.
If there is a Courier near you, connect to their Wi-Fi network to sync the data.

Relaynet enables compatible apps on your device to send and receive data from the Internet securely, even when you’re disconnected from the Internet.

When you’re connected to the Internet, it’ll be used seamlessly and you won’t have to do a thing. \n\nWhen you’re cut off from the Internet, Relaynet will connect you to couriers who will transport your data securely to and from the Internet.

Your apps will use end-to-end encryption, so it’s impossible for this app or couriers to see the contents of such data. Nor can couriers see which apps you’re using, besides Relaynet. \n\nAnd needless to say we aren’t tracking you or your apps!
